column5: Two-story home (3000 square ft.) with natural light & modern decor. Enclosed game room & outdoor bar. Patio seating in a private back yard. Spacious parking with a two car garage. One king size bed with a memory foam mattress. One queen size bed with a memory foam mattress & one full size klick Klak. Two queen size air mattresses are also available. This house is ideal for hosting get togethers and football pregame games. 15 minutes from downtown Dallas and 20 minutes from Downtown Fort Worth.
